trans-unit.source: The object where the event handler is attached.
trans-unit.target: O objeto em que o manipulador de eventos está anexado.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle routed event that occur when a tooltip opens and closes.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que manipulará eventos roteados que ocorrem quando uma dica de ferramenta abre e fecha.

trans-unit.source: When a tooltip opens and closes, this delegate provides an event handler.
trans-unit.target: Quando uma dica de ferramenta abre e fecha, este delegado oferece um manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: The element that specifies the tooltip inherits from either <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>.
trans-unit.target: O elemento que especifica a dica de ferramenta herda do <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> ou <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, open and close events exist on both of these classes.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, os eventos de aberto e fechamento existem essas duas classes.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the events that use this event handler.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir lista os eventos que usam este manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Events that occur when a tooltip opens
trans-unit.target: Eventos que ocorrem quando uma dica de ferramenta é aberto

trans-unit.source: Events that occur when a tooltip closes
trans-unit.target: Eventos que ocorrem quando uma dica de ferramenta é fechada

trans-unit.source: These events are registered by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> class using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipOpeningEvent> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipClosingEvent> fields, but the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> class does not expose these events on itself (attached or otherwise).
trans-unit.target: Esses eventos são registrados pelo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> classe usando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipOpeningEvent> e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipClosingEvent> campos, mas o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> classe expõe esses eventos no próprio (anexados ou não).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> classes both implement the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> and expose this event by defining the events in the previous table, copying the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> fields to create new routed event identifiers that exist on the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> classes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> e <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> ambas as classes implementam o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> e expor esse evento definindo os eventos na tabela anterior, copiando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> campos para criar novos roteadas identificadores de evento que existem no <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> e <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> classes.

trans-unit.source: If the tooltip is defined as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> object, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Opened> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Closed> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> class are also raised when a tooltip opens and closes.
trans-unit.target: Se a dica de ferramenta é definida como um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> objeto, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Opened> e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Closed> eventos o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> classe também são gerados quando uma dica de ferramenta para abre e fecha.
